name: WooCommerce Sendbox Shipping
author: Kpono Akpabio

sections.description: Creates new shipping method based on ‘sendbox API’ and posts shipment under order actions in Admin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload woocommerce-shipping-sendbox folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
    1. Go to Woocommerce -> Settings->Shipping-> Sendbox and update the options to your store’s info
  3. Go to Orders->Order->Order Actions and select “Shipping via Sendbox”

  4. Select quotes and Post Shipment

    1. Add shipping method to any zones you have == Frequently Asked Questions ==

What does this plugin do?

Add new shipping method that fetches aggregated carrier rates from API and posts shipments to Senbox API .

short_description: Add new shipping method that fetches aggregated carrier rates from API .
description: Creates new shipping method based on ‘sendbox API’ and posts shipment under order actions in Admin.
